reasoning: The experience and skills listed in the structured profile align closely with the job description for the Sr. Software Engineer position. Key requirements such as expertise in Linux-based systems and embedded engineering are supported by the experience as an IT Instructor Assistant, where Linux was taught. Additionally, the core skills in Python, SQL, and .NET are relevant to the job description. However, claims related to C++ and embedded engineering were not supported by the profile, so they were excluded. The overall structure of the resume follows the required format, focusing on verifiable experiences and skills.
resume_markdown:
# Darwhin Gomez

**Email:** Darwhin88@gmail.com  |  **Phone:** 347-491-2955  |  **Location:** New York, New York  
**LinkedIn:** [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/darwhin)  |  **GitHub:** [GitHub](https://github.com/dw8888)  

## Education
**Bachelor of Technology – Computer Information Systems**  
City University of New York – NYC College of Technology  
Expected Graduation: Jun 2024  
GPA: 3.78  
Dean’s List (5x)  

## Core Skills
- Python (pandas, scikit-learn, seaborn, PyTorch)  
- SQL / NoSQL  
- AWS (EC2, S3, Lambda, RDS, DynamoDB, Glue, QuickSight)  
- Azure (App Service, Functions, Storage)  
- Security (SIEM, IDS, Active Directory, Linux)  
- Automation & CI/CD  
- APIs (REST, FastAPI, Postman, Swagger)  
- Containerization (Docker)  
- Version Control (Git)  
- Agile/Scrum Methodologies  
- Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC)  
- Microservices Architecture  
- Object-Oriented Programming (OOP)  
- Database (Postgre, Oracle, MySQL, MongoDB, DynamoDB)  

## Experience
### Volunteer IT Support and Development Intern  
**Mayor’s Office of Information Services**  
New York, NY  
Feb 2024 – Current  
- Provide support to the helpdesk, development, and server teams.  
- Assist in providing white glove service to end users, including VIPs.  
- Participate in a project to restore over 400 out-of-commission devices through hardware and software updates.  
- Deploy scripts remotely as needed to support, maintain, and troubleshoot devices and infrastructure.  
- Communicate with team members at all levels to facilitate tasks and project completions.  

### IT Instructor Assistant  
**RF CUNY & Generation USA**  
Remote, NY  
Feb 2022 – Aug 2023  
- Actively taught 36 lessons covering IT support, Linux, PowerShell, and scripting for over 200 learners.  
- Planned and led workshops in Scripting in Linux and PowerShell.  
- Created a technical lab and documented solutions for configuring and implementing a RAID Solution in Windows 10.  
- Achieved a 96% cohort graduation rate.  

## Projects
### Alfred – Personal Agentic Job Search Assistant  
- Developed a FastAPI + OpenAI GPT-4 Mini system that automates resume and cover-letter generation.  
- Integrated OpenAI GPT-4.1 mini for dynamic document generation based on job descriptions.  

## Certifications
- AWS Certified Solutions Architect – Associate  
- AWS Certified AI Practitioner – Generative AI  
- Google Cybersecurity Certificate  
- Google Information Support Certificate  

## Interests
- AI Ethics and Responsible AI  
- Science Fiction Literature  
- Chess  
- Basketball  
- Poker
